task.title: View Global Metrics
task.shortdesc: View summary information about your users and the content residing on in the Global Metrics pane of the System Metrics page.

step.cmd: Open the System Metrics page, by clicking the System Metrics icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The System Metrics page opens showing the Global Metrics pane and the Data Metrics pane.

In the Users column, you can see how many users of each user role have been created. In the Content column, you can see how much used and free space there is on the system, as well as the number of objects the system is currently storing and the number of data collections that have been configured.
